section.title: Installing Client Machines
section.para: Because CentOS Studio provides installation images for each solution, solutions can be deployed to client machines using standard tools and methods:

itemizedlist.listitem: Network installation using a network interface card (NIC) with Pre-Execution Environment (PXE) support, CD/DVD or USB boot media
Virtual machine installation using virt-manager or virt-install

section.para: See the section on for complete information.
